```php
<?php

// get cURL resource
$ch = curl_init();

// set url
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://app.involve.asia/publisher/publisher/find-offer');

// set method
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'POST');

// return the transfer as a string
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);

// set headers
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authority: app.involve.asia',
  'Pragma: no-cache',
  'Cache-Control: no-cache',
  'Sec-Ch-Ua: " Not;A Brand";v="99", "Google Chrome";v="97", "Chromium";v="97"',
  'X-Csrf-Token: MMaMO60ZlSKAhIBLxLTAuSQaeSTVl3OycY5fezmh',
  'Sec-Ch-Ua-Mobile: ?0',
  'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/97.0.4692.71 Safari/537.36',
  'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8',
  'Accept: */*',
  'X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest',
  'Sec-Ch-Ua-Platform: "Linux"',
  'Origin: https://app.involve.asia',
  'Sec-Fetch-Site: same-origin',
  'Sec-Fetch-Mode: cors',
  'Sec-Fetch-Dest: empty',
  'Referer: https://app.involve.asia/publisher/deeplink-generator',
  'Accept-Language: en,zh-CN;q=0.9,zh;q=0.8',
  'Cookie: ia_hj=publisher_id=6703&fk_payment_method_id=6&fk_affiliate_status_id=1&publisher_country=US&date_last_login=2022-03-04+11%3A24%3A01&fk_user_status_id=1&publisher_manager=Jason+Tan&property_ids=6179&publisher_status=Active&publisher_language=en&membership_tier=Platinum&preferred_payout_type=&main_property_status=Active&main_property_channel=Ad+Network&main_property_primary_category=Others&main_property_secondary_category=&main_property_traffic_source_country=HK&date_last_applied_offer=2022-01-20+16%3A12%3A04&date_last_generated_link=2022-02-28+16%3A06%3A39&date_last_click=2022-03-04&date_last_conversion=2022-03-04+07%3A18%3A23&used_early_withdrawal=false&used_express_withdrawal=false; _ga=GA1.2.86429798.1638324386; _fbp=fb.1.1638324389385.560911109; _hjid=af108b2b-0a7b-4198-ab7b-6e7860f13ed5; _hjSessionUser_1768806=eyJpZCI6IjNkNGUwY2Y4LWQyNTktNTEwNy04MmU2LWQ3YzhhMzYzN2Y3ZSIsImNyZWF0ZWQiOjE2MzgzMjQzODk0NjAsImV4aXN0aW5nIjp0cnVlfQ==; _gid=GA1.2.432570157.1646364244; _gcl_au=1.1.1053637428.1646364244; _; _hjIncludedInSessionSample=1; _hjSession_1768806=eyJpZCI6IjM0OTY5OWNiLTJlYTEtNDJjMi1hZTA5LWU0NDRjNTdkM2NhMyIsImNyZWF0ZWQiOjE2NDYzNzA4NTgzMjcsImluU2FtcGxlIjp0cnVlfQ==; _hjAbsoluteSessionInProgress=0; XSRF-%3D%3D; involve_asia_%3D; AWSALB=htFFSrHay0Gax9oI9nl41ldhnMH2p2OuSQo8Ien7KVPY+huYmPdOZGnNJHd7r6gEqBe9g6KCbTIzZ6qk3oConJL9bPgbnjQJgIN42eRNwALyvfyKSrXwkSsxsoL7; AWSALBCORS=htFFSrHay0Gax9oI9nl41ldhnMH2p2OuSQo8Ien7KVPY+huYmPdOZGnNJHd7r6gEqBe9g6KCbTIzZ6qk3oConJL9bPgbnjQJgIN42eRNwALyvfyKSrXwkSsxsoL7',
  'Accept-Encoding: gzip',
]);

// form body
$body = [
  'default' => 'true',
];
$body = http_build_query($body);

// set body
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $body);

// send the request and save response to $response
$response = curl_exec($ch);

// stop if fails
if (!$response) {
  die('Error: "' . curl_error($ch) . '" - Code: ' . curl_errno($ch));
}

echo 'HTTP Status Code: ' . curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE) . PHP_EOL;
echo 'Response Body: ' . $response . PHP_EOL;

// close curl resource to free up system resources 
curl_close($ch);



```
